name: ChatChannels
body:
### What is ChatChannels?
ChatChannels is an easy-to-use Spigot plugin that allows server owners to create a multitude of chatting channels with simple yaml files. ChatChannels also features integration with the [Factions](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/factions.1900/) plugin and the [Feudal](https://www.spigotmc.org/resources/feudal-completely-configurable.22873/) plugin, allowing chat channels to be made for factions/kingdoms.

### Authors and Contributors
The author of this plugin is @Simplicitee.

### Support or Contact
Having trouble with ChatChannels? Check out the [wiki](https://github.com/Simplicitee/ChatChannels/wiki) or [report a bug](https://github.com/Simplicitee/ChatChannels/issues) and I'll do my best to fix it.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
